meanings.definition: A comfortable shoe that is easily slipped on and off.
meanings.sent1: I wear my cozy slipper every evening.
meanings.sent2: She left her pink slipper by the fireplace.
meanings.sent3: The slipper danced off her foot and onto the floor.
meanings.sent4: The slipper of the mountain allowed for a smooth descent.
meanings.sent5: The slipper hugged my foot like a soft cloud.

meanings.definition: To slide unintentionally or lose one's footing.
meanings.sent1: I almost slipper on the wet floor.
meanings.sent2: Careful not to slipper on the icy sidewalk.
meanings.sent3: He slippered across the dance floor in his fancy shoes.
meanings.sent4: Time slippered away as we enjoyed the sunny day.
meanings.sent5: The river slippered gently through the valley.

meanings.sent1: Making a slipper in the calculation cost him the game.
meanings.sent2: Her apology for the slipper was sincere.
meanings.sent3: The slipper in the recipe turned the dish into a surprise.
meanings.sent4: His slipper in judgment led to unexpected consequences.
meanings.sent5: The slipper in his speech changed the course of the meeting.
